description: Writes the configuration for the specified environment blueprint in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain.

parameters.name: enabledRegions
parameters.description: Specifies the enabled Amazon Web Services Regions. (string) ---

parameters.name: environmentBlueprintIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the environment blueprint.

parameters.name: provisioningConfigurations
parameters.description: The provisioning configuration of a blueprint. (dict) --- The provisioning configuration of the blueprint. lakeFormationConfiguration (dict) --- The Lake Formation configuration of the Data Lake blueprint. locationRegistrationExcludeS3Locations (list) --- Specifies certain Amazon S3 locations if you do not want Amazon DataZone to automatically register them in hybrid mode. (string) --- locationRegistrationRole (string) --- The role that is used to manage read/write access to the chosen Amazon S3 bucket(s) for Data Lake using Amazon Web Services Lake Formation hybrid access mode.

nested_params.name: lakeFormationConfiguration
nested_params.description: The Lake Formation configuration of the Data Lake blueprint.

nested_params.name: locationRegistrationExcludeS3Locations
nested_params.description: Specifies certain Amazon S3 locations if you do not want Amazon DataZone to automatically register them in hybrid mode.

nested_params.name: locationRegistrationRole
nested_params.description: The role that is used to manage read/write access to the chosen Amazon S3 bucket(s) for Data Lake using Amazon Web Services Lake Formation hybrid access mode.

parameters.name: regionalParameters
parameters.description: The regional parameters in the environment blueprint. (string) --- (dict) --- (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the environment blueprint was created.

nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.description: Specifies the enabled Amazon Web Services Regions.

nested_items.description: The identifier of the environment blueprint.

nested_items.description: The ARN of the manage access role.

nested_items.description: The provisioning configuration of a blueprint.

nested_items.description: The Lake Formation configuration of the Data Lake blueprint.

nested_items.name: locationRegistrationExcludeS3Locations
nested_items.description: Specifies certain Amazon S3 locations if you do not want Amazon DataZone to automatically register them in hybrid mode.

nested_items.name: locationRegistrationRole
nested_items.description: The role that is used to manage read/write access to the chosen Amazon S3 bucket(s) for Data Lake using Amazon Web Services Lake Formation hybrid access mode.

nested_items.name: provisioningRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the provisioning role.
